entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 7:05 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 97.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: ESE 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
